languages.text: "Я буду петь их саги, чтобы мир запомнил, каковы они были. А затем огонь заберет их тела, и мы помянем мою стаю, чтобы легок был их поход в Кьялхаллу".
"I will sing their sagas so that the world remembers who they were. Then the flames will take their bodies, and we will drink to the memory of my pack to ease their march to Kjalhalla."
languages.original_text: "Я буду петь их саги, чтобы мир запомнил, каковы они были. А затем огонь заберет их тела, и мы помянем мою стаю, чтобы легок был их поход в Кьялхаллу".

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我会颂唱他们的史诗，让这个世界记住他们生前的样子。随后，烈焰会带走他们的尸体，而我们会举起酒杯，为狼群的记忆干杯，让他们前往卡尔哈拉的旅途更加平顺。”
languages.original_text: "I will sing their sagas so that the world remembers who they were. Then the flames will take their bodies, and we will drink to the memory of my pack to ease their march to Kjalhalla."

traits.locale_text: “我会颂唱他们的史诗，让这个世界记住他们生前的样子。随后，烈焰会带走他们的尸体，而我们会举起酒杯，为狼群的记忆干杯，让他们前往卡尔哈拉的旅途更加平顺。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「同胞に己が何者だったかを思い出させるため、俺はサーガを歌う。それから炎に遺体をくべ、群れを偲んで一杯やるんだ。こいつらが心置きなくヴァルハラへ逝けるようにな」
languages.original_text: "I will sing their sagas so that the world remembers who they were. Then the flames will take their bodies, and we will drink to the memory of my pack to ease their march to Kjalhalla."

traits.locale_text: 「同胞に己が何者だったかを思い出させるため、俺はサーガを歌う。それから炎に遺体をくべ、群れを偲んで一杯やるんだ。こいつらが心置きなくヴァルハラへ逝けるようにな」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Cantaré sus sagas para que el mundo recuerde quiénes fueron. Después las llamas devorarán sus cuerpos y beberemos en recuerdo de mi jauría para facilitar su camino al Kjalhalla».
languages.original_text: "I will sing their sagas so that the world remembers who they were. Then the flames will take their bodies, and we will drink to the memory of my pack to ease their march to Kjalhalla."

traits.locale_text: «Cantaré sus sagas para que el mundo recuerde quiénes fueron. Después las llamas devorarán sus cuerpos y beberemos en recuerdo de mi jauría para facilitar su camino al Kjalhalla».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je chanterai leurs sagas afin que le monde se souvienne d'eux, puis leurs corps seront livrés aux flammes et nous boirons à la mémoire de ma meute afin d'alléger sa marche vers Kjalhalla. »
languages.original_text: "I will sing their sagas so that the world remembers who they were. Then the flames will take their bodies, and we will drink to the memory of my pack to ease their march to Kjalhalla."

traits.locale_text: « Je chanterai leurs sagas afin que le monde se souvienne d'eux, puis leurs corps seront livrés aux flammes et nous boirons à la mémoire de ma meute afin d'alléger sa marche vers Kjalhalla. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde ihre Sagen singen, damit die Welt sich an sie erinnert. Dann werden die Flammen ihre Körper forttragen, und wir werden im Gedenken an mein Rudel trinken, um ihren Marsch nach Kjalhalla zu erleichtern."
languages.original_text: "I will sing their sagas so that the world remembers who they were. Then the flames will take their bodies, and we will drink to the memory of my pack to ease their march to Kjalhalla."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde ihre Sagen singen, damit die Welt sich an sie erinnert. Dann werden die Flammen ihre Körper forttragen, und wir werden im Gedenken an mein Rudel trinken, um ihren Marsch nach Kjalhalla zu erleichtern."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Dünya onların kim olduğunu unutmasın diye destanlarını okuyacağım. Sonra bedenlerini alevler saracak. Biz de Kjalhalla'ya olan yolculuklarını kolaylaştırmak için sürümün şerefine içeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "I will sing their sagas so that the world remembers who they were. Then the flames will take their bodies, and we will drink to the memory of my pack to ease their march to Kjalhalla."

traits.locale_text: "Dünya onların kim olduğunu unutmasın diye destanlarını okuyacağım. Sonra bedenlerini alevler saracak. Biz de Kjalhalla'ya olan yolculuklarını kolaylaştırmak için sürümün şerefine içeceğiz."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
